page.title: 05Housing - Aby Authorpe Area
page.content: The old{tied cottage}system on farms has almost disappeared. Few jobs now have a house provided. The majority of houses are{owner occupied}& maintained to a high standard. Central heating, modern plumbing & double glazing are common.{Bungelows}are preferred by people building new dwellings. The brick & tiling materials are brought in from out of the County.{Rented property is owned by the Local District Council, many of the rents for people on low incomes are subsidised - rates too if occupants have low income. Provision is made for 6{retired couples}in a specially built unit in Aby. Many of the farm cottages have been renovated - there are a few holdiay cottages. Planning permission for new homes if given by {East Lindsey D.C.}only if within the specified building areas.
